description: Cancel dealer repayment and request stop flash sale

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format is YYYYMMDDhhmmss

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Will be invalid use and expired in xx MMDDD 20+2345

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shop's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token etc as sign. Something else here

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if/when error occurred. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if/for error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: flash_sale_id
response_fields.description: the id/value of flash flash sale

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description:
the status of flash flash sale
1: enabled
2: disabled
3: system rejected
